overview: After the release of "Synthetic Human" in 1993, director Yoichiro Serizawa waited 30 years for an opportunity to make a sequel.  Both the previous work and this one aimed at an accurate objectification of human vision.  When we see something we see it on our retina but the image in our mind is not the only thing we see.  In this film both memory and delusion are "visible" at the same time while the point of view and perception of different individuals is presented.
title: Rehabilitation Of Synthetic Human
